content: Hi all, just want to ask if the topic stream events compulsory? Is there anyway to delete it or hide it? Since many users see that the first time they join a stream and they start replying to stream events, which is messy

@Gyver Chang I don't believe we support turning that off. I am a bit skeptical that adding a feature to do so would solve your problem; it seems likely those users will reply to whatever the most recent topic is, and you can fix that by moving the messages to an appropriate topic, and it likely will be the same cleanup/teaching effort whether a "stream events" topic exists or not?

Maybe I'm missing something here, feel free to add more context on what you're doing.
